item.title: Google Analytics Alternatives - GoatCounter & Piwik.Pro
item.description: Requirement Google Analytics small Data ownership Data retenation Cloud based GoatCounnter Demo: https://stats.arp242.net/ Umami Piwik.Pro Mixpanel - not try GoAccess But neither GoatCounter nor Piwik.Pro provide a mobile App.
